name: jamm/errorhandler

suggest.jamm/memory: allows to use memory (Redis, Memcached, APC) as storage for errors log

description: Module for handling errors and uncaught exceptions (*ErrorHandler*), logging them in memory-storage (*ErrorLogger*) and notice admin about them (*MessageSender*). Also, Watcher can watch points of your process (it's especially handy for long-running processes), control memory usage and prevent unexpected process termination when memory limit is reached.
